mapper.select: select s.sname,sl.slid, sl.slname, sl.slsong_address, sl.slimg_address,a.aname,sl.song_sheetid from singer_song_list_album ssla join singer s on s.sid = ssla.sid join song_list sl on sl.slid = ssla.slid join album a on a.aid = ssla.aid where song_sheetid = #{id} order by slid

select s.sname,sl.slid, sl.slname, sl.slsong_address, sl.slimg_address,a.aname,sl.song_sheetid from singer_song_list_album ssla join singer s on s.sid = ssla.sid join song_list sl on sl.slid = ssla.slid join album a on a.aid = ssla.aid where sl.slname like "%"#{name}"%" or s.sname like "%"#{name}"%" order by slid
mapper.insert: insert into song_list(slname, slsong_address, slimg_address, song_sheetid) values (#{slname},#{slsongAddress},#{slimgAddress},#{songAheetid})
mapper.update: update song_list set slname = #{slname}, slsong_address = #{slsongAddress}, slimg_address = #{slimgAddress}, song_sheetid = #{songAheetid}, where slid = #{id}
